Detailed Description

Helper class to implement Tuxedo AsbtractServers.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

atmi::AbstractServer::AbstractServer ( )

Setup minimal requirements (mainly tpopen)

Exceptions:
TuxedoExceptionif tpopen failed.
atmi::AbstractServer::~AbstractServer ( )

minimal cleanup

Member Function Documentation

virtual void atmi::AbstractServer::handle_sighup ( ) [inline, virtual]

Handles SIGHUP signals. It normaly expected that the server takes actions to re-initialize it's internal state.

This method should be overloaded

virtual void atmi::AbstractServer::handle_sigterm ( ) [inline, virtual]

Handles SIGTERM signals. A server should cleanup and prepare it's self to terminated.

This method should be overloaded

virtual void atmi::AbstractServer::tpsvrthrdone ( ) [virtual]

Terminates a BEA Tuxedo ATMI server thread

virtual int atmi::AbstractServer::tpsvrthrinit ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
) [virtual]

Initializes a BEA Tuxedo ATMI server thread.

Parameters:
argcCLOPT argument count.
argvCLOPT user arguments
Returns:
A negative return value will cause the server dispatch thread to exit gracefully.
